Text: are you getting alot of "failed hash checks" from peers with ip address 38.100.*.*, and its going really slow today? this means you are connected to fake clients from RIAA. do an internet search for MediaSentry, MAFIAA and even the above ip block. there is plenty of info here on TPB which you can use to make their job harder, e.g. using the ipfilter.dat in utorrent
Ip changer does a good job aswell m8 :)

OrgName:    Performance Systems International Inc. 
OrgID:      PSI
Address:    1015 31st St NW
City:       Washington
StateProv:  DC
PostalCode: 20007
Country:    US

NetRange:   38.0.0.0 - 38.255.255.255 

They are using an older version of azureus.  Be sure to update your ipfilter.dat if yours using utorrent

Thanks for this upload if it's not RIAA's dirty deed. If it is, well then they'll have their hands full, 'cause it's been downloaded 26685 times.

Seed on... anyway...

thanx for the up and to those seeding. foo fighters are amazing.
